data.title: Truly Awesome Bakery! Definitely a must try!!!!!!!
data.text: awesome people, awesome cake!!! I would definitely recommend this cake shop to everyone they work with any budget! Any and every time that I have ever ordered a cake from the beginning the ordering process to the end picking up the cake has gone very smoothly! Every time I pick up a cake the show it to me first to review their work! Their buttercream is homemade and unlike any other I have tasted!

data.title: Avoid this bakery and their customer service
data.text:
I had ordered a full sheet cake for my son's graduation party which was on a Sunday. They close on Saturday at 12 so my friend picked up my cake . Before picking up the cake he did look at the cake and it looked ok. Then they suggested to wrap it so that it stays fresh. So the cake went back in the back to get wrapped. During party, when we unwrapped the cake , it was split into two. My son was very shocked to see the cake split into two pieces. So we did not cut the cake in front of all the guests  and just served.

Now comes the best part,. When I call in to tell them about the cake, i am told that my friend checked the cake and it was ok. They do not want to accept that something may have happened during the wrapping.I was told that 'they have a notice that says that as soon as cake leaves their premises , they are not responsible".  It was an expensive cake. And if i am paying for an expensive cake then i know how to take care of my cake. When I asked for a discount, I am told that if I had cut a piece off the cake and brought it back then they could have given me a discount. They really think that I would have waited to return the cake to the bakery and not serve it at all at the party.

 So I asked to talk to the owner, and the girl who works there tells me "you can keep calling everyday as i don't know her schedule". I asked her incredulously  that instead of getting my number and telling your boss to call a customer , you are telling me this.  Their customer service is horrible. I have ordered full sheet in the past from other bakers without any issues. This was my first and definitely last order. I will not recommend this business to anyone. Though Cake did taste good , I will never order a cake from them as they spoiled a perfect party with a split cake.

data.title: Great desserts
data.text: Have been going to Mary's for over 20 years.  The best cakes and pies in town.  Although the prices have recently sky rocketed and the value has gone down.  Don't plan on buying any more desserts from Mary until the pricing gets a bit more reasonable.

data.title: Great service
data.text: They did an awesome job on my sons birthday cake.  They took a picture I sent and did a wonderful job decorating it.  All of this was done via email since I don't live there anymore.  I was kept in the loop, updated and informed.  The cake was delicious!!

data.title: Best Fondant Artist Around!
data.text: I've order 2 different cakes in the past 3 months. Both required extensive fondant work. I'm surrounded by great bakeries in Houston, but will drive to pick up one from Mary's. They have both been show stoppers! Not only do they look amazing they are moist and very delicious!

data.title: Mmmmm Mmm Good!
data.text: Marys Cakes and Cookies is the place to go get your cake! The manager Joshua is the most cordial and helpful the designs are wonderful and the cookies are to die for! Marys has changed ownership and management so much I think they're finally getting right! Its great

data.title: LOVE IT!!!!
data.text: I love my sister and son birthday cake, was amazing!!! I love tha oatmeals cookies too!!! Thank you Marys cakes

data.title: AMAZING
data.text: I am In LOVE with Mary's cakes and cookies I love their icing and the cakes are soooo moist!!! Everyone's very nice and helpful!! I hate all the negative comments to be honest I have gotten nothin but great treatment. I love Mary's

data.title: Horrible Bakery!
data.text: Please never use Mary's Cakes and Cookies EVER! They are horrible. Bought a cake and pick it up, while it "looked" fine. I left than it started sinking in and then the icing and toppings fell of the side. Called to ask them to fix it they told me the only way for them to fix it was bring it back well problem I live 30 minutes away and they happen to close in 30 minutes. I was already upset because I told the girl I wanted it before 2:30PM I wanted the cake done by 9:00AM. They refuse to stay later and help me. I asked if the next day I could pick up icing they used and they refused. I asked to speak with the baker who made the cake to see how I could fix it myself and they refused.

data.title: BEST BAKERY IN TOWN!!!
data.text: I went to ask questions today over a cake for my son and the staff are so helpful great smiles all around and the manager was the most cordial and helpful imaginable and that doesn't even begin to describe their product I tried a marble cupcake and fell in love wanted just one and ended up buying a full dozen will definitely my new bakery of choice

data.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
data.text: Icing was falling off the side of the cake, was not fresh.....extremely dry! Poor mangement as well!

data.title: Amazing cakes!
data.text: I had my Wedding cake and the Grooms cake made here and it was AMAZING! We went in to do a cake tasting and I fell in love! They set my cake up the day of my wedding perfectly that was the one thing I didn't have to stress about!!! White on White cake for the wedding and chocolate oreo/ strawberry filling for the grooms cake!

data.title: Great pastries!
data.text: I LOVE the sand tarts! And when you walk in the building, you can smell the delicious cakes cooking!! Yum!!!!

data.title: DELICIOUS!
data.text: The cakes and cookies they offer are so delicious! They can do (almost) anything you'd like, and do it well! Of course, if it's something licensed and they don't have the proper permissions, they won't be able to do it, but everything I've ever had from there has been exceptional! It's a little pricey, but this is definitely one area where the phrase "you get what you pay for" holds true!
